ti:work.ti:title: An Recte Dictum Sit Latenter Esse Vivendum

ti:translation.ti:label: Whether 'Twere Rightly Said, Live Concealed.
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. 3. Goodwin, William W., editor; Whitaker, Charles, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company; Cambridge: Press of John Wilson and Son, 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Εἰ καλῶς εἴρηται τὸ λάθε βιώτας
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol 6. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner, 1895.
